recipes.title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A traditional Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper. This creamy and delicious recipe is perfect for a quick weeknight dinner.
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions. Meanwhile, fry pancetta until crispy. Beat eggs with Parmesan and pepper. Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup pasta water. Toss hot pasta with pancetta, then remove from heat and stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed for creaminess.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.description: Tender pieces of marinated chicken in a rich, creamy tomato-based sauce with aromatic spices. A beloved Indian dish that's full of flavor.
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and half the spice for 2 hours. Sauté onion and garlic, add remaining spice. Add tomatoes and simmer. Grill chicken, then add to sauce with coconut cream. Simmer 15 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Fresh romaine lettuce with homemade Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan. A classic salad that's simple yet sophisticated.
recipes.instructions: Wash and chop romaine. Toss with Caesar dressing. Top with croutons and Parmesan. Serve with lemon wedges.

recipes.title: Tacos al Pastor
recipes.description: Authentic Mexican street tacos with marinated pork, pineapple, and fresh toppings. A flavor explosion in every bite!
recipes.instructions: Marinate pork in achiote paste overnight. Grill pork and pineapple until charred. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with pork, pineapple, onion, and cilantro. Serve with lime and salsa.

recipes.title: Pad Thai
recipes.description: Thailand's most famous noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, peanuts, and a perfect balance of sweet, sour, and savory flavors.
recipes.instructions: Soak noodles until soft. Make sauce with tamarind and fish sauce. Stir-fry shrimp and tofu, push aside. Scramble eggs. Add noodles and sauce. Toss everything together. Top with peanuts and bean sprouts.

recipes.title: Classic Beef Burger
recipes.description: Juicy homemade beef patties with melted cheese, crispy bacon, and all your favorite toppings. The ultimate American comfort food!
recipes.instructions: Form beef into 4 patties, season with salt and pepper. Cook bacon until crispy. Grill burgers 4 minutes per side, add cheese to melt. Toast buns. Assemble burgers with all toppings.

recipes.title: Sushi Rolls
recipes.description: Homemade California rolls with crab, avocado, and cucumber. Fresh, healthy, and surprisingly easy to make at home!
recipes.instructions: Cook rice and season with rice vinegar. Lay nori on bamboo mat. Spread rice, flip over. Add fillings in a line. Roll tightly. Slice into 8 pieces. Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and ginger.

recipes.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
recipes.description: Decadent individual chocolate cakes with a molten center. The perfect dessert to impress your guests!
recipes.instructions: Melt chocolate and butter together. Whisk eggs, yolks, and sugar until thick. Fold in chocolate mixture and flour. Pour into greased ramekins. Bake at 425°F for 12 minutes. Let rest 1 minute, invert onto plates. Serve with ice cream.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: The trendy breakfast favorite! Creamy avocado on crispy sourdough with a perfectly poached egg and everything bagel seasoning.
recipes.instructions: Toast bread until golden. Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Poach eggs in simmering water. Spread avocado on toast. Top with poached egg. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with seasonings.

recipes.title: Greek Moussaka
recipes.description: Layered eggplant casserole with spiced meat sauce and creamy béchamel. A hearty Greek comfort food.
recipes.instructions: Salt eggplant slices and let drain. Brown lamb with onions, add tomatoes and cinnamon. Make béchamel with butter, flour, and milk. Brush eggplant with oil and bake until soft. Layer eggplant, meat, and béchamel. Top with cheese. Bake at 350°F for 45 minutes.

recipes.title: Vietnamese Pho
recipes.description: Aromatic beef noodle soup with rice noodles, tender beef slices, and fresh herbs. A comforting bowl of Vietnamese tradition.
recipes.instructions: Simmer bones and brisket with spices for 8 hours. Strain broth. Cook noodles. Slice brisket thinly. Assemble bowls with noodles, broth, beef. Top with herbs, bean sprouts. Serve with lime, sriracha, and hoisin.

recipes.title: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
recipes.description: Healthy vegetarian bowl packed with quinoa, roasted vegetables, chickpeas, and tahini dressing.
recipes.instructions: Cook quinoa. Roast sweet potato and chickpeas with spices. Massage kale with olive oil. Make tahini dressing with lemon. Assemble bowls with quinoa, vegetables, chickpeas. Top with avocado and dressing.

recipes.title: French Onion Soup
recipes.description: Classic French soup with caramelized onions, rich beef broth, and melted Gruyère cheese on toast.
recipes.instructions: Slowly caramelize onions in butter with sugar for 45 minutes. Add wine and reduce. Add broth and herbs, simmer 30 minutes. Toast baguette. Ladle soup into oven-safe bowls, top with bread and cheese. Broil until bubbly.

recipes.title: Korean Bibimbap
recipes.description: Colorful rice bowl topped with seasoned vegetables, gochujang sauce, and a fried egg.
recipes.instructions: Cook rice. Marinate beef in soy and sesame. Blanch and season vegetables separately. Stir-fry beef. Fry eggs sunny-side up. Arrange rice in bowls, top with vegetables, beef, egg. Serve with gochujang and sesame oil.

recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Authentic Neapolitan pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and San Marzano tomato sauce.
recipes.instructions: Roll out dough. Crush tomatoes with garlic and salt. Spread on dough. Tear mozzarella over top. Bake at 500°F for 10 minutes until crust is golden. Top with fresh basil and olive oil.

recipes.title: Beef Wellington
recipes.description: Elegant beef tenderloin wrapped in mushroom duxelles and puff pastry. Perfect for special occasions.
recipes.instructions: Sear beef, brush with mustard. Make mushroom duxelles. Layer prosciutto, duxelles, pâté. Wrap beef. Encase in puff pastry. Brush with egg wash. Bake at 400°F for 40 minutes. Rest before slicing.

recipes.title: Caprese Sandwich
recipes.description: Simple Italian sandwich with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil, and balsamic glaze on ciabatta.
recipes.instructions: Slice ciabatta and toast lightly. Layer mozzarella and tomato slices. Add basil leaves. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic. Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Tom Yum Soup
recipes.description: Hot and sour Thai soup with shrimp, lemongrass, and fragrant herbs.
recipes.instructions: Bring broth to boil with lemongrass, galangal, lime leaves. Add mushrooms and shrimp. Season with fish sauce and chilies. Finish with lime juice. Garnish with cilantro.

recipes.title: Falafel Wrap
recipes.description: Crispy chickpea fritters wrapped in pita with fresh vegetables and tahini sauce.
recipes.instructions: Blend chickpeas with herbs and spices. Form into balls. Deep fry until golden. Warm pita. Fill with falafel, vegetables, tahini sauce.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy American pancakes perfect for weekend breakfast.
recipes.instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Whisk eggs, milk, butter. Combine wet and dry. Cook on griddle until bubbles form, flip. Serve with butter and maple syrup.

recipes.title: Tiramisu
recipes.description: Classic Italian dessert with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
recipes.instructions: Whisk yolks and sugar over double boiler. Cool and fold in mascarpone. Mix espresso with rum. Dip ladyfingers in coffee. Layer with mascarpone cream. Refrigerate 4 hours. Dust with cocoa before serving.

recipes.title: Ramen Bowl
recipes.description: Rich Japanese noodle soup with pork belly, soft-boiled egg, and flavorful broth.
recipes.instructions: Braise pork belly until tender. Make broth with miso and soy. Cook noodles. Soft-boil eggs. Slice pork. Assemble bowls with noodles, broth, pork, egg. Garnish with green onions, nori, sesame.

recipes.title: Fish Tacos
recipes.description: Baja-style tacos with crispy fish, cabbage slaw, and creamy sauce.
recipes.instructions: Make beer batter. Coat fish and fry until golden. Mix cabbage with lime. Make creamy sauce with mayo and lime. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with fish, slaw, sauce, cilantro.

recipes.title: Shakshuka
recipes.description: Middle Eastern breakfast with eggs poached in spiced tomato sauce.
recipes.instructions: Sauté onions, peppers, garlic. Add tomatoes and spices. Simmer 10 minutes. Make wells and crack eggs into sauce. Cover and cook until eggs set. Top with feta and parsley. Serve with pita.

recipes.title: Smoothie Bowl
recipes.description: Thick, creamy açaí smoothie bowl topped with fresh fruits, granola, and seeds.
recipes.instructions: Blend açaí, banana, berries with milk until thick. Pour into bowl. Top with granola, sliced fruits, seeds, coconut. Drizzle with honey.

recipes.title: Lamb Gyros
recipes.description: Greek street food favorite with spiced lamb, tzatziki sauce, and fresh vegetables in warm pita bread.
recipes.instructions: Marinate lamb in Greek seasoning for 2 hours. Make tzatziki: mix yogurt, cucumber, garlic, dill, salt. Grill lamb until charred. Warm pita bread. Spread tzatziki on pita, add lamb, vegetables, and feta. Wrap and serve with extra tzatziki on the side.

recipes.title: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.description: Italian-American classic with breaded chicken, marinara sauce, and melted mozzarella over spaghetti.
recipes.instructions: Pound chicken thin. Dredge in flour, dip in beaten eggs, coat with breadcrumbs. Pan-fry until golden. Place in baking dish, top with marinara and mozzarella. Bake at 375°F for 20 minutes. Cook spaghetti. Serve chicken over pasta, garnish with basil and Parmesan.

recipes.title: Beef Pho
recipes.description: Traditional Vietnamese beef noodle soup with aromatic broth, tender beef, and fresh herbs.
recipes.instructions: Roast bones at 425°F for 30 minutes. Simmer with spices, ginger, onion for 8 hours. Strain and season broth. Cook noodles. Place raw beef in bowls, add noodles, pour boiling broth over. Top with herbs and bean sprouts. Serve with lime, jalapeños, and sauces.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Quick and healthy Asian-style stir-fry with crisp vegetables and savory sauce.
recipes.instructions: Cut vegetables uniformly. Mix sauce ingredients. Heat wok on high, add oil. Stir-fry hard vegetables first, then softer ones. Add garlic and ginger. Pour in sauce and cornstarch slurry to thicken. Toss in cashews. Garnish with sesame seeds. Serve over rice.

recipes.title: Eggs Benedict
recipes.description: Classic brunch dish with poached eggs, Canadian bacon, and hollandaise sauce on English muffins.
recipes.instructions: Make hollandaise: whisk egg yolks and lemon in double boiler, slowly add melted butter, season with cayenne. Toast English muffins. Pan-fry Canadian bacon. Poach eggs in simmering water with vinegar. Assemble: muffin, bacon, egg, hollandaise. Garnish with chives.

recipes.title: Chicken Enchiladas
recipes.description: Rolled tortillas filled with chicken and cheese, smothered in enchilada sauce.
recipes.instructions: Mix chicken with half the cheese, beans, and onion. Spread enchilada sauce in baking dish. Fill tortillas with chicken mixture, roll tightly. Place seam-side down. Cover with remaining sauce and cheese. Bake at 350°F for 25 minutes. Top with sour cream, cilantro, jalapeños.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Classic beef tacos with seasoned ground beef, fresh toppings, and all the fixings.
recipes.instructions: Brown ground beef, drain excess fat. Add taco seasoning and water, simmer until thickened. Warm taco shells. Set up taco bar with all toppings. Let everyone build their own tacos. Serve with Mexican rice and refried beans.

recipes.title: Salmon Teriyaki
recipes.description: Glazed salmon with sweet and savory teriyaki sauce, served with steamed rice and vegetables.
recipes.instructions: Make teriyaki sauce: simmer soy sauce, mirin, honey, vinegar, ginger, garlic until thickened. Pan-sear salmon skin-side down 4 minutes. Flip and brush with teriyaki. Finish in oven at 400°F for 5 minutes. Serve over rice with broccoli, garnish with sesame seeds and green onions.

recipes.title: Lasagna
recipes.description: Classic Italian layered pasta with meat sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella.
recipes.instructions: Brown meats with garlic, add marinara. Mix ricotta with egg, Parmesan, herbs. Cook noodles. Layer in 9x13 pan: sauce, noodles, ricotta, mozzarella. Repeat layers. Cover with foil, bake at 375°F for 45 minutes. Uncover, bake 15 more. Rest 15 minutes before cutting.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo
recipes.description: Creamy fettuccine Alfredo with grilled chicken. Rich and indulgent!
recipes.instructions: Season and grill chicken, let rest then slice. Cook fettuccine. Melt butter, sauté garlic. Add cream and simmer. Stir in Parmesan until smooth. Toss pasta in sauce. Season with pepper and nutmeg. Top with sliced chicken and parsley.

recipes.title: Shrimp Scampi
recipes.description: Garlic butter shrimp with white wine sauce over linguine.
recipes.instructions: Cook linguine. Melt butter, sauté garlic and red pepper flakes. Add shrimp, cook 2 minutes per side. Remove shrimp. Add wine and lemon juice, reduce. Return shrimp. Toss with pasta. Garnish with parsley, lemon zest, Parmesan.

recipes.title: BBQ Ribs
recipes.description: Fall-off-the-bone tender ribs with smoky BBQ sauce.
ingredients: Dry rub (paprika, brown sugar, garlic powder)
recipes.instructions: Remove membrane from ribs. Rub generously with dry rub, refrigerate 4 hours. Wrap in foil, bake at 275°F for 2.5 hours. Unwrap, brush with BBQ sauce. Broil 5 minutes until caramelized. Let rest 10 minutes. Cut into portions.

recipes.title: Vegetable Curry
recipes.description: Aromatic Indian vegetable curry with coconut milk and warming spices.
recipes.instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, ginger. Add curry powder and garam masala, toast spices. Add tomato paste, then vegetables. Pour in coconut milk and broth. Simmer 20 minutes. Adjust seasoning. Garnish with cilantro. Serve with rice or naan.

recipes.title: Beef Stew
recipes.description: Hearty slow-cooked beef stew with vegetables in rich gravy.
recipes.instructions: Dredge beef in seasoned flour. Brown in batches. Sauté onions and garlic. Deglaze with red wine. Add beef, broth, tomato paste, herbs. Simmer 1.5 hours. Add vegetables, cook 45 more minutes. Season with Worcestershire.

recipes.title: Chicken Quesadilla
recipes.description: Crispy tortilla filled with chicken, cheese, and peppers.
recipes.instructions: Sauté peppers and onions. Mix with chicken and half the cheese. Place filling on half of each tortilla, top with remaining cheese. Fold in half. Cook in skillet until golden and cheese melts, 3 minutes per side. Cut into wedges.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: Creamy Italian rice dish with mushrooms and Parmesan.
recipes.instructions: Sauté mushrooms in butter, set aside. Cook onion until soft. Add rice, toast 2 minutes. Add wine, stir until absorbed. Add broth 1 cup at a time, stirring constantly. After 20 minutes, stir in mushrooms, butter, Parmesan. Finish with thyme and truffle oil.

recipes.title: Pulled Pork Sandwich
recipes.description: Slow-cooked shredded pork with BBQ sauce on a soft bun.
recipes.instructions: Rub pork with spices. Place in slow cooker with vinegar. Cook on low 8 hours until tender. Shred with forks. Mix with BBQ sauce. Toast buns. Pile pulled pork high, top with coleslaw and pickles.

recipes.title: Chicken Fried Rice
recipes.description: Quick and easy fried rice with chicken, vegetables, and egg.
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken in hot wok, set aside. Scramble eggs, set aside. Add vegetables, stir-fry 3 minutes. Add rice, breaking up clumps. Add soy sauce and sesame oil. Toss everything together with chicken and eggs. Stir-fry 5 minutes.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with tomatoes, cucumber, feta, and olives.
recipes.instructions: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, onion, feta, olives in bowl. Whisk olive oil, vinegar, lemon juice, oregano for dressing. Pour over salad, toss gently. Let sit 10 minutes for flavors to meld. Serve with crusty bread.

recipes.title: Minestrone Soup
recipes.description: Hearty Italian vegetable soup with pasta and beans.
recipes.instructions: Sauté onion, carrot, celery. Add tomatoes, broth, Parmesan rind, seasonings. Simmer 20 minutes. Add zucchini, green beans, pasta, kidney beans. Cook until pasta is tender. Remove Parmesan rind. Garnish with fresh basil and grated Parmesan.

recipes.title: Beef Burrito Bowl
recipes.description: Customizable burrito bowl with seasoned beef, rice, beans, and fresh toppings.
recipes.instructions: Brown beef, add taco seasoning and water, simmer. Warm beans. Build bowls: rice, beans, beef, corn, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese. Top with sour cream, guacamole, salsa. Serve with lime wedges.

recipes.title: Caprese Pasta
recipes.description: Simple pasta with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta al dente. Sauté garlic in olive oil. Add tomatoes, cook until softened. Toss with hot pasta, mozzarella, and basil. Season with salt and pepper. Drizzle with balsamic glaze. Top with Parmesan.

recipes.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.description: Classic comfort soup with tender chicken, vegetables, and egg noodles.
recipes.instructions: Simmer chicken breasts in broth with bay leaf and thyme until cooked. Remove chicken, shred. Sauté carrots, celery, onion. Add to broth. Add noodles, cook until tender. Return chicken to pot. Season with salt, pepper, lemon juice. Garnish with parsley.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.description: Colorful bell peppers filled with seasoned rice, ground beef, and cheese.
recipes.instructions: Brown beef with onion. Mix with rice, tomatoes, half the cheese, seasonings. Stuff peppers with mixture. Place in baking dish with water. Cover with foil, bake at 375°F for 35 minutes. Uncover, top with remaining cheese, bake 10 more minutes.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic homemade chocolate chip cookies. Soft, chewy, and irresistible!
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F. Mix flour, baking soda, salt. Cream butter and sugars. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Gradually mix in flour mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop rounded tablespoons onto baking sheets. Bake 9-11 minutes until golden. Cool on wire rack.
